Tavatron activated her com and replied:

"I'm more or less fully recovered. I await your arrival... Tavatron out." 
Tavatron reverted to beast mode and walked toward the mouth of the cave. She 
stood, her tail twitching from side to side:

*Battle is close at hand, I can feel it.* Tavatron searched the trees for 
Dinobot, prepared to move out.


>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Wed, 19 Apr 2000 20:35:17 PDT
>
>* Dinobot snarls as his intercom blares with Liono's voice, and he was SO
>close to.
>He watched as a nice plump stag ran off in fright as the voice from his
>intercom died away, this wasn't his day!
>Dinobot turned and began to run back towards the cave where he had left
>Tavatron earlier, he sighed as he opened his com-link to the Maximal
>frequency...*
>
>" Transmission received, Tavatron and I are on our way. Dinobot...out."
>
>* Dinobot then switched to Tavatron's com-link...*
>
>" You may have already heard, however, we are required back at Base. Alert
>of a Predacon battle has been called and all Maximals are to report in. I 
>am
>on my way back to you, be ready when I arrive...repaired or not."
>
>* Dinobot ran on as fast as he could, dodging around trees and leaping over
>moss covered logs. Tavatron and himself had to be at base in less then 1/2 
>a
>mega-cycle, his goal if no one else's.
>He scanned and saw that the cave was less then a click away now, he sped up
>and snarled...battle at last!*
>
